snippet.title: Bloodletter - Ludum Dare 44 Compo Entry
snippet.description:
This is my entry for LD44 Compo. The theme was "Your life is currency" and in this game you buy time with your blood, in other words activate bullet time using your own health. The game was made in FTE Quakeworld, using tools like Blender, GIMP, NetRadiant, Audacity and Sunvox.

Get the game at https://shp.itch.io/bloodletter
